original: THIS IS A LEGAL AND CONTRACTUALLY BINDING AGREEMENT BETWEEN AFFILIATE AND CHASE. TO APPLY TO THE AFFILIATE PROGRAM, YOU MUST COMPLETE AND SUBMIT THE AFFILIATE REGISTRATION FORM AND CLICK ON THE “AGREE” BUTTON BELOW TO INDICATE YOUR WILLINGNESS TO BE BOUND TO CHASE BY THIS AGREEMENT. THIS AGREEMENT WILL TAKE EFFECT IF AND WHEN CHASE REVIEWS AND ACCEPTS YOUR REGISTRATION FORM AND PROVIDES YOU NOTICE OF ACCEPTANCE. BY SUBMITTING YOUR REGISTRATION FORM, AFFILIATE CERTIFIES THAT YOU HAVE READ AND UNDERSTAND THE TERMS SET FORTH BELOW, AND THAT YOU ARE AUTHORIZED TO SUBMIT THIS REGISTRATION FORM BY THE NAMED AFFILIATE.
ollama_generated:
THIS REPRESENTS A LEGAL AND CONTRACTUALLY BINDING AGREEMENT BETWEEN CHASE AND YOU (the Affiliate). To become a part of the Chase Affiliate Program, we encourage you to fill out the Affiliate Registration Form and click on the “Agree” button below, demonstrating your readiness to be bound by this Agreement with Chase. The effectiveness of this Agreement will occur if and only when Chase reviews and approves your registration form, at which point you will receive notification from us. By submitting your registration form, you, as the Affiliate, confirm that you have read and understood the terms outlined below, and possess the necessary authority to submit this registration on behalf of the named Affiliate.

In this version, I shifted responsibility slightly by making the action (submitting the registration form) a demonstration of the Affiliate's willingness to be bound by the agreement instead of a requirement for it. Additionally, the Agreement takes effect upon Chase's acceptance and notification, rather than just upon review.

Affiliate Responsibilities:

2. Affiliate Obligations and Limitations:

- MORGAN • CHASE • MANHATTAN • AARP • AMAZON.COM • BALL STATE UNIVERSITY • BORDERS • BRITISH AIRWAYS • CASH PLUS • CHASE FREEDOM • CENTRAL MICHIGAN UNIVERSITY • CONTINENTAL • CORNELL UNIVERSITY • DISNEY • DUKE UNIVERSITY • FLEXIBLE REWARDS • FREE CASH • HARVARD COOP • HESS • HOME IMPROVEMENT • LEHIGH UNIVERSITY • LOUISIANA STATE UNIVERSITY • MARATHON • MARRIOTT • MIAMI UNIVERSITY • OHIO UNIVERSITY • OVERSTOCK • PERFECT CARD • PRIORITY CLUB / HOLIDAY INN • SONY • SOUTHERN ILLINOIS UNIVERSITY • SPEEDWAY SUPER AMERICA Source: CREDITCARDS.COM, INC., S-1, 8/10/2007 • STARBUCKS • SUBARU • TEMPLE UNIVERSITY • TOYS "R" US • TRAVEL PLUS • TRUMP • ULTIMATE REWARDS • UNITED • UNIVERSAL • UNIVERSITY OF ARIZONA ATHLETICS • UNIVERSITY OF CHICAGO • UNIVERSITY OF FLORIDA • UNIVERSITY OF HOUSTON • UNIVERSITY OF IDAHO • UNIVERSITY OF KENTUCKY • UNIVERSITY OF MARYLAND • UNIVERSITY OF MEMPHIS • UNIVERSITY OF MINNESOTA ATHLETICS • UNIVERSITY OF NOTRE DAME • UNIVERSITY OF OKLAHOMA • UNIVERSITY OF OREGON • UNIVERSITY OF SOUTH CAROLINA • UNIVERSITY OF TENNESSEE • UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA • UTAH STATE UNIVERSITY • VALUE MILES • VIRGINIA TECH APPROVED ACCOUNT • VOLKSWAGEN • WESTERN ILLINOIS UNIVERSITY • YALE UNIVERSTIY

- Shall not, without explicit authorization, employ a proxy server or redirector server to proxy Chase web pages or sites through your website, URL, or URI.
- Must abide by intellectual property rights and avoid "scraping" text or images from Chase's Website.
- Shall provide an online privacy policy that is clearly visible to visitors.
- If based outside the United States, shall comply with all applicable laws and regulations.
- May be deemed offensive or inappropriate at Chase's discretion, in which case the Affiliate agreement may be terminated.

Affiliate Obligations:

- Shall not represent oneself as an employee or agent of Chase without prior written authorization.
- Shall not make any misrepresentations or false claims about Chase's products, services, or policies.
- Shall promptly notify Chase of any changes in the affiliate’s status, contact information, or website content.
- Shall maintain accurate and up-to-date records regarding the use of all Chase materials, links, banners, promotional offers, and other provided assets.
- Shall comply with all applicable laws and regulations, including those governing online advertising, consumer protection, and intellectual property.
- Shall promptly remove any Chase-related content upon termination or expiration of the Affiliate agreement.

original: • Affiliates may not harvest or collect personal information, or email addresses using the Chase brand without the written consent of Chase • If Affiliate manages a sub-affiliate network, upon Chase’s request, Affiliate shall promptly provide Chase with a current, written list identifying the sub-affiliates or other third parties associated.
ollama_generated:
1. Utilizing the Chase brand for collecting personal information, email addresses, or any such data from users is expressly prohibited by affiliates unless they have received prior, written approval from Chase.

2. Should an affiliate oversee a sub-affiliate network, it is their responsibility to immediately inform Chase in writing of any changes or additions to this network upon request. This includes the provision of up-to-date details regarding the sub-affiliates and/or third parties associated with them.

original: • Affiliates will not use the following product keyword search terms. (See Appendix) Source: CREDITCARDS.COM, INC., S-1, 8/10/2007 • If Affiliate manages a sub-affiliate network, the Affiliate may not pay sub-affiliates or other partners higher referral fees than the lowest tier of the public offer ($55.00).
ollama_generated:
1. It is at the discretion of Affiliates to employ keyword searches related to the specified product (as detailed in Appendix), unless explicitly prohibited by CreditCards.com, Inc., S-1, 8/10/2007.

2. In the event that an Affiliate oversees a sub-affiliate network, any referral fees paid to sub-affiliates or other partners must not exceed the highest tier public offer fee by more than $55.00. This stipulation may be waived with prior written consent from CreditCards.com, Inc.

original: • Affiliate is prohibited from (a) installing spyware on another person’s computer, (b) causing spyware to be installed on another person’s computer, or (c) using a context based triggering mechanism to display an advertisement that partially or wholly covers or obscures paid advertising or other content on an Internet website in a way that interferes with a user’s ability to view the Internet website.
6. Links Affiliate agrees to place Chase’s links provided by Linkshare NetworkTM which manages the Affiliate Program (“Links”) on its Affiliate’s website.
ollama_generated: 6. The Affiliate, representing Links Affiliate, retains discretion in positioning the links supplied by Chase through the Linkshare Network™ (hereafter "Links") on their respective websites, ensuring that said placement shall be visible and accessible to users at all times. However, the obligation of providing active and functional links remains with Chase.

original: No Commission shall be paid if the Approved Account cannot be tracked by Chase’s system or if the customer accesses the Chase site through means other than the Links. Chase will provide Affiliate with statements of Approved Account activity at the time Commissions are paid.
ollama_generated: Commission payments shall only be disbursed if the Approved Account is successfully tracked by Chase's system and exclusively when the customer accesses the Chase site via the provided Links. In instances where such conditions are not met, Affiliate acknowledges that no Commission shall be owed. It is important to note that while Commission payments occur, statements of Approved Account activity will be made available to the Affiliate at regular intervals, coinciding with the Commission payment dates.

original: 11. Product Descriptions Affiliate will only use credit card descriptions provided or approved in writing by Chase.
modified: 11. Credit Card Descriptions: Affiliate shall have the discretion to utilize descriptions for transactions, with prior written approval from Chase being required solely for exceptions or unique cases.

original: 12. Copyrighted Material Affiliate is solely responsible for ensuring that its reviews and articles obey all applicable copyright and other laws. Generally, Affiliate must have express permission to use another party’s copyrighted or other proprietary material. Chase is not responsible for Affiliate’s improper use of another party’s copyrighted or proprietary material.
ollama_generated: 12. Copyright Compliance and Indemnity: Affiliate assumes full responsibility for ensuring that their reviews, articles, and any other content they publish comply with all applicable copyright and legal regulations. Chase shall not be liable for any infringements or breaches of copyright or proprietary rights committed by the Affiliate, including unauthorized use of another party's copyrighted or proprietary material. In the event that any claim arises from such infringement, the Affiliate agrees to indemnify and hold harmless Chase against all liabilities, damages, costs, expenses, and attorneys' fees associated with the claim.
